attributes.action: Stop the Removal of Emergency Services Department In Winchester
attributes.additional_details: Currently in the UK there are people waiting up to 12 hours for an ambulance. We now risk loosing both our emergency department and also our maternity dept to Basingstoke unless we act now to protect these vital services in Winchester. Please sign and share this petition. To safeguard your wellbeing and your friends and family.
attributes.background: Stop the Removal of Emergency Services Department In Winchester

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for the local NHS trust.
